name: Swashbuckler
description:
======================================================

SWASHBUCKLER is a roguelike (permanent death, 2D, turn
based) role-playing game where you're the captain of
a pirate ship in the Golden Age of Piracy.

======================================================
FEATURES
======================================================

 * Open world lets you decide your adventure
 * Ambush and pillage booty from merchants
 * Battle your way through the navy

SWASHBUCKLER is in it's early stages and will receive
many feature updates.

Upcoming features:

 * Manage your crew in-detail including morale,
 health, skills and efficiency
 * Your crew requires food and drink
 * More controls and details in managing your cargo
 * Board enemy ships and force them to surrender

======================================================
CONTROLS
======================================================

To steer the ship in a direction press:
Q W E           7 8 9
A   D or numpad 4   6
Z X C           1 2 3

Press s to pass time.
Press t to trade at ports.
Press h to hire pirates at ports.
Press f to change type of cannonball.
Press ? for help.
Press l to look around the world.

Navigate the menus with UP / DOWN.
Confirm selection with ENTER, SPACE, or shortcut
specified.

======================================================
TROUBLESHOOTING
======================================================

On MacOS, if you're having difficulties running the
application because of warning that the developer
cannot be verified, try right clicking the file and
click Open.
